1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: "God Himself could not sink this ship!" boasted the head of White Star Line, the shipping company that built the Titanic, and yet on 14 April 1912, the liner sank only 2 hours and forty minutes after hitting an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean. The tragedy resulted in the loss of over 1,500 people, making it one of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in history. Please turn on Closed Captions.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: "God Himself could not sink this ship!" boasted the head of White Star Line, the shipping company that built the Titanic, and yet on 14 April 1912, the liner sank only 2 hours and forty minutes after hitting an iceberg in the Atlantic Ocean. The tragedy resulted in the loss of over 1,500 people, making it one of the deadliest peacetime maritime disasters in history. Please turn on Closed Captions.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: To mark the 100th anniversary of Titanic's sinking, experts took part in an exhaustive study of the wreck that yielded unprecedented new discoveries and the first comprehensive map of Titanic's watery grave.
